main event: A UFO with clear lights of varying color, about the size of a half dollar, was observed in Fairborn, Ohio on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object exhibited rapid changes in brightness, remaining stationary for about 30 minutes, and was compared to Venus by the observer., Another colored object appeared approximately 20 minutes later., The sighting lasted for 30 minutes and involved a single object., Witness described the object as changing in size and brightness like a pulsating star., The object was visible at night, with an estimate of hundreds of feet away from the observer.
sighted object: UFO with clear lights of varying color
witness description: The observer reported seeing bright lights in the night sky and provided a well-detailed account of the event.
